sentences.cn: 一种难以言喻的心情紧紧揪住了希姆.

sentences.en: For some inexplicable reason he gave up a fantastic job.
sentences.cn: 由于某种莫名其妙的原因，他放弃了一份很不错的工作。

sentences.en: For some inexplicable reason she was attracted to Patrick.
sentences.cn: 因为某些无法解释的原因，她被帕特里克所吸引。

sentences.en: For some inexplicable reason, he felt depressed.
For some inexplicable reason, the investors decided to pull out.
sentences.cn: 由于某些无法说明的原因，投资商们决定撤出投资。
她的缺席无法解释,令我担忧.

sentences.en: His behaviour was extraordinary and inexplicable.
sentences.cn: 他的行为不同寻常，让人费解。

sentences.en: His inexplicable debts were a byword in his circle.
sentences.cn: 他那些来历不明的借款成为那圈子里人议论的话题.

sentences.en: It is now inexplicable how that development was misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 当时对这一事态发展的错误理解究竟是怎么产生的,现在已经无法说清楚了.

sentences.en: Mr. Bumble's conduct , on being left to himself, was rather inexplicable.
sentences.cn: 班布尔先生独自留下时的举动实在令人费解.

sentences.en: Somewhere behind his thoughts an inexplicable excitement stirred.
sentences.cn: 一股不可言状的激动人心的暖流,在他的脑海深处翻腾起来.

sentences.en: The downfall of Germany seemed to him inexplicable by ordinary processes.
sentences.cn: 德国的失败,在他看来,按通常的事理是难以理解的.

sentences.en: The inexplicable disappearance of some nonlocal seasonal women worders worried everyone.
sentences.cn: 有几个外来女临时工失踪了,令人费解,使大家十分担忧.
他们的举动完全令人摸不头脑.

sentences.en: There are many things which are inexplicable by science.
sentences.cn: 有很多事科学还无法解释.

sentences.en: This theory makes sense of an otherwise inexplicable phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 这种理论能说明这一其他理论无法解释的现象.

trans.tran_cn: 无法解释的，费解的，莫名其妙的
trans.tran_en: too unusual or strange to be explained or understood
